titleStmt.title: George Ioye confuteth, Vvinchesters false articles
George Joye confuteth, Winchesters false articles.
titleStmt.author: Joye, George, d. 1553.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the Widow of C. Ruremond],
publicationStmt.pubPlace: [Printed at Wesill in Cliefe lande [i.e. Antwerp :
publicationStmt.date: the yere of our Lorde M.D.xliii in the monethe of Iune] [1543]

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
